headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for TP-Link TAPO security cameras

name.title: Name
name.description: Set the camera name for display in the Home app

password.title: TAPO password
password.description: Password of your TAPO app (not the password for the RTSP configuration)

streamUser.title: Stream User
streamUser.description: Username to access the RTSP video feed (You can find them in TAPO app > Settings > Advanced Settings > Camera Account)

streamPassword.title: Stream Password
streamPassword.description: Password to access the RTSP video feed (You can find them in TAPO app > Settings > Advanced Settings > Camera Account)

pullInterval.title: Pull Interval
pullInterval.description: Numbers of milliseconds after we update accessories by polling the status of the camera

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enables debugging of the underlying camera-ffmpeg plugin

disablePrivacyAccessory.title: Disable Privacy
disablePrivacyAccessory.description: Disables the privacy mode switch accessory

lowQuality.title: Low Quality
lowQuality.description: Video stream will be requested in low-quality (640x480) instead of HQ (1920x1080)

vcodec.title: Video Codec
vcodec.description: Set the codec used for encoding video sent to HomeKit, must be H.264-based. You can change to a hardware accelerated video codec with this option, if one is available.

videoFilter.title: Additional Video Filters
videoFilter.description: Comma-delimited list of additional video filters for FFmpeg to run on the video. If 'none' is included, the default video filters are disabled.

encoderOptions.title: Encoder Options
encoderOptions.description: Options to be passed to the video encoder.
